local_intent: Ensure plate is perceived, move to a safe pose above it, and verify arrival for transfer phase.
assumptions: Plate pose becomes available after detection
Path planner can reach above-plate pose with 0.02 m offset
coherence_with_global: Replicates plate-perception fallback, executes MoveAbove(plate, 0.02, 1500), then verifies position via IsAt, matching the transfer step prior to placement.
